name: Two Grey Hills Gallery
description: A family-owned business since 1976, specializing in fine Native American arts and jewelry, including Navajo weavings, pottery, and more. While primarily a gallery, they may have connections or insights into local Native American arts community events

name: Fighting Bear Antiques
description: Specializes in Native American art, Molesworth furniture, and other collectible antiques. They feature Native American baskets, moccasins, ollas, and beadwork
